message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $150. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $130. It's a high-quality item, and I'm confident it's worth it.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it.
